remarks: Define the strict complete (linear) order predicate.  The expression ` R Or A ` is true if relationship ` R ` orders ` A ` .  For example, ` < Or RR ` is true ( ~ ltso ).  Equivalent to Definition 6.19(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1996.)
statement:
df-so $p |- ( R Or A <-> ( R Po A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x R y \/ x = y \/ y R x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d R x y $.
